text: فَكَيْفَ إِذَا تَوَفَّتْهُمُ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ يَضْرِبُونَ وُجُوهَهُمْ وَأَدْبَـٰرَهُمْ

translation.en.sahih: Then how [will it be] when the angels take them in death, striking their faces and their backs?
translation.id.indonesian: Bagaimanakah (keadaan mereka) apabila malaikat mencabut nyawa mereka seraya memukul-mukul muka mereka dan punggung mereka?
